footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Noelle | Update Date: 02/06/2024 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Redhorn Stonethresher__ 
Redhorn as a weapon is tailor made for Noelle's kit. High Crit mainstat, additional DEF and DEF to Normal and Charged ATK DMG bonus make it Noelle's best weapon.

__Whiteblind__
Best Free craftable option with DEF%.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Serpents spine, Skyward Pride, Verdict, Beacon of the Reed Sea

__Tidal Shadow__
On par with Whiteblind if played with Furina. There is no reason to replace your Whiteblind, but if you have neither, it is a little bit more universal.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> DEF% or ATK% |<goblet>  Geo DMG Bonus |<circlet>CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Favonious Bladework- Maid
**2)** Elemental Burst: Sweeping Time
**3)** Elemental Skill: Breastplate

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Pre C6 ATK% sands may be better than DEF%.
__Marechaussee Hunter__ should only be played with Furina.
